item.title: DebtorsWatch compiles data on delinquent payments in India
item.description: DebtorsWatch is the first online platform in India designed for reporting trade defaults. The interactive website allows businesses to report overdue payments and defaults, conduct credit checks, and monitor customer creditworthiness. Registered members can also utilize the data for due diligence. Deepanjan Periwal, Chartered Accountant and founder of DebtorsWatch, highlights the lack of transparency in India’s credit system compared to countries like the US, UK, and Australia, where credit tracking is standard practice.
